mapper.sql: deadline_id, deadline_name, time, course_project_id, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, deadline_note, deadline_image, complete
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM myddl_deadline WHERE deadline_id IN ( SELECT deadline_id FROM myddl_user_deadline WHERE user_id = #{userId} )

SELECT
FROM myddl_deadline WHERE deadline_id IN ( SELECT deadline_id FROM myddl_group_deadline WHERE group_id = #{groupId} )
mapper.insert: insert into myddl_deadline (deadline_id, deadline_name, time, course_project_id, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, deadline_note, deadline_image, complete) values (#{deadlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deadlineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadlineNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadlineImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complete,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update myddl_deadline
deadline_name = #{deadlineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_project_id = #{courseProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_email = #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deadline_note = #{deadlineNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deadline_image = #{deadlineImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
complete = #{complete,jdbcType=BIT},
where deadline_id = #{deadlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
